about_the_game:
Create a confectionery empire in Sweets Inc, the business management simulation game where you take the helm of your very own sweets manufacturing company. Design delectable treats, build and manage your factories, and market your products across the continent to become an industry tycoon!




Welcome to Bonbonia, a land known for its insatiable appetite for all things sweet. In Sweets Inc, you'll embark on an enticing entrepreneurial journey where your goal is to captivate the palates of Bonbonians across the continent.




Dive into the art of confectionery design by creating your own scrumptious sweets in the design studio. Use an extensive array of ingredients including nuts, fruits, berries, spices, and other flavorings to craft unique confections that are both delicious and profitable!




Build up your factories, progressing from humble beginnings to overseeing vast, state-of-the-art production facilities. Start with simple machines and manual workstations, then strategically upgrade to automated production lines that optimize efficiency and output.




The continent of Bonbonia is yours to explore. Expand your business into Bonbonia's diverse regions to discover what opportunities they have to offer. Research and develop new confection-making processes and equipment to keep your business thriving.




  • Location, Location, Location - Choose factory locations in one of Bonbonia's 7 distinct regions based on the unique prospects each region offers.
  • Design Studio - Craft alluring treats in the Design Studio using a wide variety of ingredients and confection types.
  • Factory Building - Design efficient factories, from simple manual workstations to complex automated production lines.
  • Employee Management - Ensure your employees are working efficiently by assigning work areas and providing ample break-time facilities.
  • Suppliers - Choose the suppliers you want to do business with based on the quality and cost of their ingredients.
  • Buyers - Do deals with buyers, from small general shops to massive market chains, each with their own preferences.
  • Research & Development - Research and unlock new confection-making processes and machines as well as new ingredients to use.
